sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均含有"不喜欢"之意。
means: dislike ： 普通用词，指任何程度的憎恶，但永远指正面的憎恶和反对。
hate ： 指因对某人或某事强烈不满或反感，或因利害关系等而产生憎恨。
disgust ： 指对令人不快、生厌或坏的东西或行为怀有强烈的憎恶。

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均有"恨，厌恶"之意。
means: hate ： 最普通常用词，指因利害冲突或出于正义感或其它因素而对人或物或某种行为表示厌恶，憎恨或极不满。
disgust ： 多指对丑恶的行为或对令人不快的事或坏的东西有强烈的憎恶之感。
dislike ： 语气较弱，指一般的厌烦或不喜欢，有时可能是天生的反感。

sentence.Network_en: They had a snobbish dislike for their intellectual and social inferiors.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们非常势利，不喜欢智力和社会地位不如自己的人。

sentence.Network_en: He may suddenly take a dislike to foods that he's previously enjoyed.
sentence.Network_cn: 对以前爱吃的食物，他兴许突然就没了胃口。

sentence.Network_en: Norma is said to dislike the glare of publicity.
sentence.Network_cn: 据说诺尔玛不喜欢被人过多关注。

词汇竞赛 - 中国习网 ... Telegraphy 电信技术 Dislike 讨厌 Indirect 间接的.
看_百度百科 ... [belittle] 看不起人。 [dislike;hate to see] 厌恶 [be unable to see;be invisible] 不能看见。.
高中英语新课程标准词汇表 ... dish n. 盘，碟；盘装菜；盘形物 dislike vt. 不喜爱；厌恶 dismiss vt. 让……离开；遣散；解散；解雇.

list.abs: Wherever I go , nowhere I like ; I dislike everywhere ., 无论我到哪里 , 没有哪里为我喜欢 , 我讨厌每一个地方.
am sorry to disappoint you , but I dislike wearing such dress ., 对不起 , 让你失望 , 我不喜欢穿这种服装.
It is not that I dislike you ., 并非是我讨厌你.
are there any animals which you dislike ., 你讨厌什么动物.
七年级上册英语复习提纲 ... let sb do sth 让某人做某事 dislike doing sth 不喜欢做某事 keep doing sth 保持一直做某事.

entry.def: If you dislike someone or something, you consider them to be unpleasant and do not like them.

example.ex: We don't serve liver often because so many people dislike it...
example.tran: 我们不常做肝这道菜，因为很多人吃不惯。

example.ex: David began to dislike all his television heroes who smoked.
example.tran: 戴维开始讨厌所有他曾喜欢的吸烟的电视偶像了。

entry.def: Dislike is the feeling that you do not like someone or something.

example.ex: He made no attempt to conceal his dislike of me...
example.tran: 他毫不掩饰对我的厌恶。

example.ex: Years of dislike boiled over and blows were exchanged.
example.tran: 多年的厌恶之情终于爆发，双方拳脚相加。

entry.def: Your dislikes are the things that you do not like.

example.ex: Consider what your likes and dislikes are about your job...
example.tran: 想想工作中哪些部分是自己喜欢的，哪些是不喜欢的。

example.ex: Strong irrational dislikes of other people can easily be picked up from others.
example.tran: 对他人无端的厌恶之情别人可以轻易察觉到。

entry.def: If you take a dislike to someone or something, you decide that you do not like them.

example.ex: I took a violent dislike to him...
He may suddenly take a dislike to foods that he's previously enjoyed.
example.tran: 对以前爱吃的食物，他兴许突然就没了胃口。

means.word_mean: 1. an inclination to withhold approval from some person or group
2. a feeling of aversion or antipathy;
1. have or feel a dislike or distaste for;

auth_sentence.content: There is a lot to dislike about modern football.
auth_sentence.res_content: There is a lot to dislike about modern football.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: There is a lot to dislike about modern football.

auth_sentence.content: I dislike him because he does not like people.
auth_sentence.res_content: I dislike him because he does not like people.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I dislike him because he does not like people.

auth_sentence.content: Why did so many people dislike her so much?
auth_sentence.res_content: Why did so many people dislike her so much?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Why did so many people dislike her so much?

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表示"分开,分离,去掉"; 2. 表示"否定,不,消失掉"

stems_affixes.word_buile: dis否定,不,消失掉+graceful优美的→adj.可耻的, 不名誉的
dis否定,不,消失掉+honest诚实的→adj.不诚实的
dis否定,不,消失掉+incline愿意→adj.不愿的
dis否定,不,消失掉+passionate有激情的→adj.平心静气的
dis否定,不,消失掉+solute溶解→溶解开来→没有限制→放荡的
dis否定,不,消失掉+son声音+ant……的→声音不[好听]
dis分开,分离,去掉+cern搞清,确定+ment表名词→确定不同之处→有眼光

stems_affixes.value_cn: 不利, 不利条件, 缺点, 劣势

dis不+gust美味→n. 厌恶,恶心 v. 使厌恶
dis否定,不,消失掉+honour尊敬→毫无尊敬→丢脸
dis否定,不,消失掉+may能→不能做事→沮丧;参考:五月能种粮食,所以叫May
dis否定,不,消失掉+order顺序→没有顺序
dis否定,不,消失掉+proof证实→不证实→反证
dis分开,分离,去掉+course课程,教程→分解课程→论述→论文
dis分开+play=ply重叠→打开折叠→显示出来
dis分开,分离,去掉+affect感情→感情分开→疏远
dis分开,分离,去掉+burse钱包→从钱包中分出→支出
dis分开,分离,去掉+crimin分辨→ate→分辩开
dis分开,分离,去掉+cuss敲打→把[问题]分开敲→讨论
dis分开,分离,去掉+miss送→分开送出→解散
dis分开,分离,去掉+part部分→分成部分→分开
dis分开,分离,去掉+pens花费+e→分开花费→分配[财富等]
dis分开,分离,去掉+semin种子+ate表动词→散布[种子]
dis分开,分离,去掉+tend伸展,拉→分开伸展→膨胀
dis分开,分离,去掉+tract拉→把[心]拉开→分心
dis不+adapt使适应→v.使不适应
dis否定,不,消失掉+appear出现→不出现→消失
dis否定,不,消失掉+arm武装→去掉武装
dis否定,不,消失掉+courage勇气→v.使失去勇气
dis否定,不,消失掉+cover盖→把盖揭开→发现
dis不+gust美味→n. 厌恶,恶心 v. 使厌恶
dis否定,不,消失掉+honour尊敬→毫无尊敬→丢脸
dis否定,不,消失掉+like喜爱→不喜爱
dis否定,不,消失掉+organize组织→解散组织
dis否定,不,消失掉+pel推→推开→驱除

sentences.en: That man was disliked inside the college.
sentences.cn: 全校的人都不喜欢这个人。

sentences.en: I dislike to go to the cinema alone.
sentences.cn: 我不喜欢一个人去看电影。

sentences.en: My mother dislikes our being together.
sentences.cn: 我母亲不喜欢看到我们在一起。

sentences.en: His wife dislikes him to be a smoker.
sentences.cn: 他妻子不喜欢他当烟民。

sentences.en: She dislikes you to disturb her so often.
sentences.cn: 她不喜欢你经常去打扰她。

sentences.en: I dislike my wife going out often.
sentences.cn: 我讨厌我妻子经常外出。

means.word_mean: 不喜爱, 厌恶, 反感

sentences.en: I don't know why, but I took a strong dislike to him as soon as I saw him.
sentences.cn: 也不知道为什么, 我一见到他就十分讨厌。

means.word_mean: 不喜欢的东西; 不喜欢的事物; 讨厌的事物

sentences.en: We have our likes and dislikes.

jushi.english: That man was disliked inside the college.
jushi.chinese: 全校的人都不喜欢这个人。
